mapper.select: select R.*, M.name, M.phone, M.address from reservation R inner join member M on R.id = M.id where R.num = #{num}
SELECT R.num, R.model, R.type, R.detail, R.loc, R.date, M.name, M.phone, M.address FROM reservation R INNER JOIN member M ON R.id = M.id
mapper.insert: insert into reservation(model, type, detail, loc, date) values(#{model}, #{type}, #{detail}, #{loc}, #{date})
